Stem: Green or reddish green, very hairy, square.
Leaves: Opposite arranged, hairy, blade is egg shaped or oval shaped, possibly heart shaped.
Flowers: Pinkish or lavender blue tubular flowers, singly or in clusters of up to 5.
FruitSeeds: Lobed capsule that divides into 2 nutlets with a single seed each. Brown to black with whitish markings.
DistinguishingFeatures: As flowers die, distinctive tube remains.
